Ok, I've figured out how to get this working.  The instructions in the NFO suck, because they don't specify that you have to place the crack in the original Sims 3 folder (C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3 Town Life Stuff\Game\Bin), *NOT* the Town Life Stuff folder.  Then run TS3SP04.exe from the Town Life Stuff folder and enjoy the game.

hi guys had same problem in getting game to work.. i followed these instructions and game works fine..

You must copy the crack to: C:\Program Files (X86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3\Game\Bin INSTEAD OF C:\Program Files (X86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3 Town Life Stuff\Game\Bin
You must copy the crack to: C:\Program Files (X86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3\Game\Bin INSTEAD OF C:\Program Files (X86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3 Town Life Stuff\Game\Bin

I have a rip of the retail disc that I made myself (so technically I have the paid version of the game) and I was able to install this and all the other expansions.

Essentially what I did was install the base game, NOT crack it, let it update through the Sims 3 launcher, then install and update any expansion in the same fashion. When I was done, THEN I cracked the game- but not by using the ones that came with any of the expansions. Instead I found a crack that matched the BASE GAME's updated version number (at this point something like 1.24.3) and placed it in the BASE GAME's game\bin folder.

If you have a copy of the legit base game (or a copy of its legit exe) and just one single crack for the updated version of the base game, it's all you need.

ALRIGHT listen up here people who are having problems, this is what you do!!!!

Make sure you have DAEMON TOOLS!
This is what you mount to, you can download Daemon Tools Lite for FREE at the download website.


Unrar/unzip everything and mount into your daemon tools when instructed.
Some DO NOT NEED DAEMON TOOLS!  In this case, just open the SETUP application and run it.


Install in THIS order.


!!!!!!!DO NOT CRACK ANYTHING!!!!!!!!

THIS IS KEY! 

If you crack ANYTHING during your installs you will make it so NONE of them work and you might even have problems REMOVING them as they won't even UNINSTALL correctly


UPDATE WHEN ASKED
it won't hurt and you cannot move on unless you allow the update in EACH install!
